definition: A person, object, or concept that serves as a source of inspiration or emulation, often admired and looked up to by others. It is commonly used to refer to someone or something that is seen as a role model or a positive example to follow.

examples.german: Sie ist ein Vorbild f端r uns alle.
examples.english: She is a role model for all of us.

examples.german: Er sieht in seinem Vater ein Vorbild.
examples.english: He sees his father as a role model.

examples.german: Die ber端hmte Schauspielerin ist ein Vorbild f端r viele junge Menschen.
examples.english: The famous actress is a role model for many young people.
He tries to emulate his role model.

examples.german: Sie ist ein Vorbild f端r Disziplin und Ausdauer.
examples.english: She is a role model for discipline and perseverance.
